title: Praline Pumpkin Pie
ingredients: ['1 (23cm) pastry case, unbaked', '30g ground pecans', '75g dark brown softsugar', '30g butter, softened', '2 eggs', '250g pumpkin puree', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground mace', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '250ml single cream']
